personalInfo.name: Ayoub Bigharassine
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full-stack developer with expertise in building production-ready web applications and SaaS platforms. Specialized in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. Experienced in designing user-centered interfaces through research and usability testing, developing scalable solutions, and deploying cloud-based applications. Passionate about clean code, design patterns, and delivering high-impact products.

experience.description: Developing cross-platform mobile applications for a human resource management software platform using React Native.
highlights: Building cross-platform mobile solutions for employee onboarding and HR processes
Implementing features for payroll processing and performance tracking
Collaborating with the team to enhance organizational efficiency through mobile technology
Developing user-friendly interfaces for compliance management features

experience.description: Internship focused on mobile development for a comprehensive learning management system using Flutter and Laravel.
highlights: Developed mobile features for attendance tracking and grade management
Worked with Flutter for cross-platform mobile development
Integrated Laravel backend APIs for real-time communication features
Contributed to tools supporting schools, teachers, students, and parents

education.description: Africa-focused tech training program providing hands-on education in software engineering through online cohorts and partnerships, emphasizing practical skills and job placement.
Studied chemistry before transitioning to tech career.

projects.name: Expert Review Marketplace (Mentorlib)
projects.description: A marketplace platform connecting clients with industry experts for business reviews, featuring integrated scheduling and payment processing. Automated scheduling system reduced booking time from days to minutes.

projects.name: Restful API Solution (SheetLayer)
projects.description: A SaaS platform that transforms Google Sheets into RESTful APIs with built-in authentication, API management, and subscription billing. Reduced API development time from hours to minutes.

projects.name: Store CMS
projects.description: A headless content management system for e-commerce stores, providing API-driven product, category, and inventory management with modern admin interface.

projects.name: Issue Tracking System
projects.description: A comprehensive issue tracking platform built with Laravel and React, enabling teams to report, prioritize, and resolve issues efficiently with role-based access control.
